abilities.name: Quantum Invader
abilities.rule: This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.

abilities.name: Invasion Beams
abilities.rule: At the end of the Fight phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this **TRANSPORT**, you can select one friendly **NECRONS INFANTRY** unit wholly within 6" of this **TRANSPORT**. Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this **TRANSPORT**.
